Installing this is easy. First shut down internet connection. Then unzip and install the software.

An automatic registration option will start. Shut down this and go to the Oneone folder in Applications.

Open folder and click "License manager". Now click on the import license option in the top menue. 

Now open the keygen and generate a 15 digit activition code. Type it and click ok (the ok button)

Use Little Snitch and block software. I do it always. Open internet and you have the best resize software ever ready to go....
